Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the SMART DEVICES skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your SMART DEVICES hardware by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your SMART DEVICES account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at https://www.cogcons.com.

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

1. Use the names you previously set up in SMART DEVICES APP (Available for Android and iOS). 
2. Create an Alexa group, like kitchen or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. 

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

"Alexa, turn on the kitchen.
"Alexa, turn off the Downstairs."
